issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
while running test TIMOB-1607 I noticed that a white screen flashes after I try to zoom-out an image, which appears on a black screen when I press buttons "OFF", "ON" or "ON DEMAND" respectfully. 

Not a regression, the behavior exists on 2.0.1 as well.

Test steps
1. Launch Application 
2. Press OFF 
3. Double tap screen to zoom-in.
4. Double tap screen to zoom-out.
5. Press back 
6. Press ON 
7. Repeat steps 3,4.
8. Press back 
9. Press ON DEMAND
8. Repeat steps 3,4.

Expected result:
Step 2. Black screen will appear briefly and web view plugin will be disabled 
Step 4. Red screen will appear briefly and web view plugin will be enabled 
Step 6. Blue screen will appear briefly and a placeholder will be in place of the plugin

Actual result:
Step 2. Black screen will appear briefly and web view plugin will be disabled 
Step 4. Black screen will appear briefly and web view plugin will be enabled 
Step 6. Black screen will appear briefly and a placeholder will be in place of the plugin
fields.summary: Android: TI.UI.WebView  - v8: White screen partially flashes  when " zooming-out" an image.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.3.201205291919
Titanium SDK: 2.0.2.v20120530102130
Device: Nexus One 2.2.2

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and no progress for a number of years. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
